eventDescription: We're going to be picking up trash at [park name] to reduce the littering in the area.
Volunteer at the annual environment conference! Helpers are needed to set up and facilitate the event.
Climate change must be addressed! Come and let your voice be heard.
Do you have any used books? Please donate them to [library name]! A box will be set up in the lobby for drop-off.
We're students from [school name] and will be selling [stuff]. Please drop by and support our school.
Let your voice be heard! Let's fight for racial justice together.
We're organizing a bake sale at [location] to raise money for the BLM movement. All proceeds will be donated to [org name]. Please email [email address] if you'd like to help out.
Come show your support the LGBTQ+ community!

We're organizing a craft market to raise money for our organization which focuses on LGBTQ+ advocacy. Send an email to [email address] if you'd like to sell or just drop by to see what we're offering!
Donations will be donated to [organization name]. Come and drop off some cans! Volunteers are needed too.

We are organizing a holiday event for our residents at [retirement home]. A small group of volunteers is needed to help us setup and facilitate. Please send and email to [email] for more details and to RSVP.
We need volunteers for the [marathon name] Marathon. Volunteers will be tasked with handling registration and distributing water at checkpoints. Donations are accepted!
We're organizing a blood drive that will be donated to [hospital name]. Please drop by and donate some of your blood! Volunteers are needed also. Contact [email] for more details.
We're collecting children's toys to donate to the local children's hospital. We'll have a large secure donation box in front of [location name] for drop off.
Volunteers will be tasked with reaching out to voters and collect voter data. Please note that we are a nonpartisan organization aimed solely at increasing voter turnout.
Come help register people to vote! Just 1 hour of training is needed. Please contact [email] for more details.
